lastError: MaterialX has pre-existing issues: missing headers (MXGenShaderNodes/SourceCodeNode.h), render module incompatibilities (metal-cpp vs Objective-C), external dependencies not included. Not related to OpenUSD 25.11 alignment.

blockerDetails.issue: MaterialX pre-existing integration issues (NOT related to OpenUSD alignment)
affectedFiles: MaterialXGenShader/*.cpp - includes MXGenShaderNodes/*.h which don't exist
MaterialXRender/*.cpp - missing external dependencies (TinyObjLoader, Cgltf, StbImage)
MaterialXRenderMsl/*.cpp - mixes metal-cpp and Objective-C APIs
blockerDetails.resolution: MaterialX source files need include path updates to match MetaverseKit header naming convention. Render modules need external dependencies or exclusion.
